TopicTitle: The case of the MK2 Cargo Bay

Articles.Content:
So I was flying A plane and I crashed in to the SPH control tower. So I exploded and cargobay and inline cockpit fused together and when I landed It became a kraken drive. When ever I hit the ground I gained about 10 M/S. So finally they separated and I got jeb out to walk to the cargobay. I didn't know if you could walk inside the cargobay and then I started to walk and you can actually move it while walking. After then again didn't know you could do this and I opened the cargobays. I put Jeb on the moving things and closed the doors witch closed on his neck and he started shacking and then I got flung. So of crouse I had to do it again and I spent like 10 minutes trying to do it again and I finally got. This lone Mk2 Cargobay maybe the funniest thing have ever seen on KSP. Also pics!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
